ppal_addcustom.help_text: Add the current palette to the custom palettes list

ppal_test.help_text: Temporarily add the current palette to the palette chooser

ppal_exportas.help_text: Export the current palette to a file

ppal_importfrom.help_text: Import data from a file in the current palette

ppal_gradient.help_text: Add a gradient to the palette

ppal_moveup.help_text: Move this palette one rank towards the first

ppal_movedown.help_text: Move this palette one rank towards the last

ppal_duplicate.help_text: Create a copy of this palette at the end

ppal_removeothers.help_text: Keep only this palette and erase all others

ppal_report.help_text: Write an info report on this palette

ppal_generate.help_text: Generate full range of palettes from the first

ppal_colormap.help_text: Generate colormap lump from the first palette
